title: Elderwood Xayah [Concept]

replies.body: I need this.
You guys both know what to do. Pass it on.
I swear to god if Riot makes this rather than Elderwood Kindred Imma slap some bitches.
whynotboth.png

They'll be too busy making her Heartseeker skin, unfortunately. 
Unless Xayah is one of those champs that gets 5 skins in 3 years.
This is gorgeous! I love the tree bark on her horns and legs, and her hair mingling with the autumn leaves is so pretty. Thanks so much for sharing!
Thank you! And you are welcome, I loved to work on it and getting so much inspiration from the other skins! (๑•̀ㅂ•́)و
This is so cool *__*!! the color palette suits her so well and your work is beautiful! Thank you for sharing!
Very welcome!! I really enjoyed working on it (*•̀ᴗ•́*)و ̑̑

I would like to buy that skin but I would be cooler if Rakan was included in the skin.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I think xayah and rakan wont get a skin if the other one doesent get the same or opposite skin
Hmmmm... What's the opposite of Elderwood?
Death Blosom?

idk, it is kinda neutral
it isnt good or bad it just is so there is nothing opposite to it

Drawing an apple is easy for anyone...
You just... Have to embrace the liberality of art...
Use your imagination... And MS Paint... And two elipse tools...

https://i.imgur.com/b1ofpDn.png

{{champion:202}} 4/4
Only 1 apple = 1/4
https://i.imgur.com/dUidwmZ.png
Perfection.
FTFY We can't talk about perfection when it come to Jhin, without having every comment at 4 upvotes or downvotes!!!!
lotta people saying where's Rakan. I have an idea for a rakan skin based of off this. xayah looks like fall, why not have rakan look like spring? All colorful and leafy.
I like this idea!! ೕ(•̀ㅂ•́ )

I do like the overall look of this concept, from the colors, the flowing hair, the Bark Armor, and how her Feathers are now razor sharp leaves. Just one small question: Can we get a {{champion:497}} to complement and/or contrast her? Please?
I'm very glad you like it! I would consider also doing Rakan! I only did not because these were 1 day prompts, so I didn't have time in one day ╭(♡･ㅂ･)و ̑̑ I will consider for future!
This is dope! I would definitely want to buy this.
Where's our elderwood Rakan tho?
I love the orange!
Riot needs to hire you asap.
I would buy this skin ez <3 Great work!

Where can one find the themes?? Link?
 This is amazing btw.
Hi! All of the prompts and themes are in RiotKateyKhaos' tweet here: https://twitter.com/KateyAnthony/status/909525472584728576

I've never seen such a great skin. I love the style, I love the colors, I love all the little details, and even the pose fits Xayah so well.

11/10. It's a mastapeece.
An awesome concept! Nicely done :D I definitely want to see this ingame!

That looks awesome! The leafy effects would be perfect for her spells.

One point of feedback: Xayah flexes and twists her knees a lot in-game and I feel like it would look a bit strange when she is making all those movements with fully wood legs. It seems to me she would need some large cracks (for joints) or no bark at all at her knees and ankles.
But where's rakan? {{champion:497}}
Make a elderwood rakan, this one is great but rakan needs one as well

I can totally see the "flurry of leaves" effect when she pulls back her feathers, too.

I'll honestly be surprised if we don't see this as a skin within 2, *maybe* 3 years.

Amazing.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Surprised at the lack of bush jokes.
this is freaking beautiful, i want this so bad i would buy it so hard.  can we also get newly wed xayah/rakan?
Also, this works so well with elder wood's theme, like what the heck! I love it though!
yessss
Bookmarked and downloaded. This is beautiful!

What about the candyland skin for rakan as duo
Sugar rush as ult
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
elderwood xayah and ravenborn rakan pls all i ask
